title: CoinOPS 5 - Full Original Release
description:
I will be uploading the latest update (R22) shortly. 

CoinOPS 5 for the XBOX

Thanks to everyone for a successfull release (Ace Chill Dail people owe you alot)

The biggest upgrade CoinOPS has seen with 1000s more games supported and 100s of popular games now fixed and playing as they should...
The full package comes with the greatest collection of 3800 Arcade Games / Console Games / Computer and Handheld Games...complete with videos and optomised for the best experience the XBOX can bring
This is for most the one package to have...it will answer nearly everything in one package and one simple and powerfull GUI....with the fewest issues.....If your new to this, you are going to experience what Console Emulation is all about...
 




Featuring the largest most complete Arcade Game support on the XBOX
Latest and most complete Final Burn Alpha support on the XBOX
Over 22,000 Supported Games, 5000 more than CoinOPS 4

Support for

Arcades (NEW)
Amiga
Amstrad 
Atari 2600
Atari Lynx
Atari ST
Atari 5200
Atari 800
Atari XL
Classic PC (NEW)
ColecoVison
Commodore 64
CPS III 
DOOMs
DOS (NEW)
Game Gear
Gameboy
Gameboy Advance
Gameboy Color
Intellivision
Laser Disc Support (NEW)
Killer Instincts
Master System
Mega CD
Megadrive
MSX
NES
Nintendo 64
PC Engine
PC Engine CD
Playstation
Quakes
Scummvm (NEW)
Sega SG-1000
Spectrum
Super Nintendo
Vic 20
WonderSwan (NEW)
X68000
XBOX Games

100s of arcade games work that don't work on any other XBOX emulator (NEW)
100s of arcade games that control properly that don't work on any other XBOX emulator (NEW)
100s of arcade games that work at speed that don't work on any other XBOX emulator (NEW)
XBOX Commandline Launching
Street Fighter 3 Third Strike
Streets of Rage Remake
Hexen (NEW)
Heritic (NEW)
Mortal Kombat with sound support (NEW)
NBA Jams with sound (NEW)
Lots and Lots of exclusives (NEW)

Hi Score saving
FTP Support

Splash Screen Video support (NEW)

Autorotate (NEW)
customisation (NEW)
Video Preview support support
Marquee support (NEW)
Default System Marquee support customisible (NEW)
Background Music support
Filter by by many ways
Filter and Switch though systems (NEW)
Most featured sort engine for any emulator on the XBOX
Most acurate keymap acade emulator on the XBOX
Simple favorite system support
Cheat support
Monitor on it side support
Keymap support
One click Pixel Perfect support
Simplest keymaping and aspect correction for Console on the XBOX
Greatest Aspect Correction support for any arcade emulator on the XBOX
One click aspect correction support
Commandline support
Game tracking stat support
Mouse and trackball support
Game Information support
Vector game support
Artwork support

The list goes on and on.......you name it, its probably got it

Thanks to the staff at Coinops Project for the original release.
